name: General Practice
description: Provides primary care for patients of all ages

name: Pediatrics
description: Focuses on medical care for infants, children, and adolescents

name: Obstetrics and Gynecology
description: Specializes in women's reproductive health and childbirth

name: Surgery
description: Performs surgical procedures to treat injuries, diseases, and deformities

name: Psychiatry
description: Diagnoses and treats mental health disorders

name: Cardiology
description: Specializes in disorders of the heart and blood vessels

name: Dermatology
description: Focuses on diseases of the skin, hair, and nails

name: Neurology
description: Deals with disorders of the nervous system

name: Orthopedics
description: Specializes in conditions affecting the musculoskeletal system

name: Oncology
description: Focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of cancer

name: Radiology
description: Specializes in medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases

name: Anesthesiology
description: Administers anesthesia and manages pain during surgical procedures

name: Ophthalmology
description: Deals with diseases and surgery of the visual pathways

name: Urology
description: Focuses on diseases of the urinary tract and male reproductive system
